about.summary: Automatically mock your HTTP interactions to simplify and speed up testing

name: vcrpy
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.10.3" %}

package:
  name: vcrpy
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: vcrpy-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/v/vcrpy/vcrpy-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b2c76736999d81d5321b94d997e3480ffbde8fe56d918eb2798d0e0545cb9f21

build:
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
  number: 2

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pyyaml
    - wrapt
    - six >=1.5
    - mock  # [py27]
    - contextlib2  # [py27]

  run:
    - python
    - pyyaml
    - wrapt
    - six >=1.5
    - mock  # [py27]
    - contextlib2  # [py27]

test:
  # Python imports
  imports:
    - vcr
    - vcr.persisters
    - vcr.serializers
    - vcr.stubs

about:
  home: https://github.com/kevin1024/vcrpy
  license: MIT License
  summary: 'Automatically mock your HTTP interactions to simplify and speed up testing'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dopplershift
